Improve operational readiness, dependability, and safety with Honeywell solutions for the Leonardo AW139 helicopter.
The Leonardo AW139 helicopter features leading edge technology that supports a variety of helicopter missions including corporate and VIP transport, oil and gas, law enforcement, health and emergency services, as well as search and rescue operations. Across the board, we see enormous benefits in safety, efficiency, availability, cost and mission effectiveness as the state-of-the-art cockpit continues to evolve. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/weather-radar/rdr-7000]]>
IntuVue RDR-7000 Weather Radar <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/weather-radar/rdr-7000?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_commhelo_aw139]]>
Honeywell’s IntuVue RDR-7000 Weather Radar System gives helicopter pilots the clear and timely information they need to make safer, faster and more informed decisions before flying in bad weather and challenging environments.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/weather-radar/rdr-7000?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_commhelo_aw139]]>
